A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is the best live action Star Wars movie I have ever seen. Characters have depth and are much more morally black-and-white than in previous entries. Kylo Ren is an absolutely intriguing villian and the Eastern inspiration present in this movie is very welcome. This is what Star Wars is meant to be in my book. Completely unpredictable with characters that suffer from issues very similar to those in our own world. My biggest gripe with the movie is how side-tracked it can get. Character idealogies still read like poetry\, so this grievance is lessened. I recommend for fans of film to go watch this. If\, however\, you are a big fan of all things Star Wars\, there's a good chance you won't enjoy this movie.
